authors: Glen Cooper, JVC Parry, Phil Beckwith, James Introcaso, Cindy Moore, Tony Petrecca, Benoit de Bernardy, Jeff C. Stevens, Shawn Merwin, Travis Legge, Elven Tower, Scott Bean, Kelsey Dionne, Emmet Byrne, Marc Altfuldisch PLUS MANY MORE!

trait.name: Grim Harvest
entries: When the necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell’s level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Talon
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 ({@dice 2d4}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Abyssal Giant Lizard
monster.languages: understands Abyssal and Draconic but cannot speak

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the abyssal giant lizard can take a bonus action to make a bite attack against a different creature.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) piercing plus 5 ({@dice 2d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the arachtus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a group of cacti.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The arachtus has advantage against creatures it has surprised.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the arachtus can move up to its speed towards a hostile creature that it can see or sense with its tremorsense.

trait.name: Spiked Body
entries: A creature that touches the arachtus or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@dice1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arachtus makes one bite attack and one spine flick attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spine Flick
entries: The arachtus uses its hind legs to flick the spines on its back in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@dice2d10}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Point Blank Shot
entries: The arrow demon can ignore disadvantage on an attack roll if they are within 5 feet of a hostile creature who they can see and isn’t incapacitated.

trait.name: Large Weapon Wielder
entries: The arrow demon can wield weapons up to one size larger than their size would allow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arrow demon makes two large longbow attacks or claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 ({@dice 1d8+4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arrow demon’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
